channel.title: Cas van der Hoven
channel.description: Recent content on Cas van der Hoven

item.title: My Personal Laptop Setup
item.description: I use a couple of laptops in my day-to-day activities. This is always a hassle, as I’m switching contexts, logins, and hardware multiple times per day. To reduce friction I decided to write down some notes about my laptop setup. This is mainly for me to re-use in the future, but I figured this might help others in similar situations. Browser: Firefox I use Firefox for web browsing, mainly due to its Container Tab feature and Mozilla’s focus on privacy.
